author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Samsung Display And Universal Display Enter Into OLED Agreements
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Universal Display Corp:
* SAMSUNG DISPLAY AND UNIVERSAL DISPLAY CORPORATION ENTER INTO LONG-TERM OLED AGREEMENTS
* UNIVERSAL DISPLAY CORP - FINANCIAL TERMS OF AGREEMENTS HAVE NOT BEEN DISCLOSED.
* UNIVERSAL DISPLAY CORP - SIGNING OF LONG-TERM OLED MATERIAL SUPPLY AND LICENSE AGREEMENTS WITH SAMSUNG DISPLAY CO LTD
* UNIVERSAL DISPLAY CORP - AGREEMENTS ARE SCHEDULED TO RUN THROUGH DECEMBER 31, 2022, AND MAY BE EXTENDED FOR AN ADDITIONAL TWO-YEAR PERIOD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
